Homepage.title: Welcome to Ebenezer
Homepage.subtitle: Evangelical Pentecostal Christian Organization
Homepage.description: Dedicated to sharing Christ's love and transforming lives through the gospel

Banner.title: Welcome to Ebenezer
Banner.subtitle: Where Faith Meets Hope
Banner.description: We are an international evangelical pentecostal Christian organization committed to sharing the gospel and transforming lives through the power of Jesus Christ.

AboutUs.title: About Us
AboutUs.subtitle: Our Story and Mission
AboutUs.description: Ebenezer is more than an organization; it's a family of believers united by Christ's love and the desire to serve God and the community.
AboutUs.missionText: To proclaim the gospel of Jesus Christ, make disciples, and transform lives through the power of the Holy Spirit.
AboutUs.visionText: To be a light in the world, bringing hope and love to all nations.

Staff.title: Our Team
Staff.subtitle: Leaders Dedicated to Service
Staff.description: Meet the pastors and leaders who guide our congregation with love and dedication.

Ministries.title: Our Ministries
Ministries.subtitle: Serving in Various Areas
Ministries.description: Discover the different ways we serve our community and share Christ's love.

Testimonials.title: Testimonials
Testimonials.subtitle: Stories of Transformation
Testimonials.description: Hear the powerful stories of how God has transformed lives in our congregation.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: We're Here for You
Contact.description: Have questions? Need prayer? Want to join our family? Don't hesitate to contact us.
